2:
All you angels who belong to him, praise him!\q2 All you who are in the armies of Yahweh, praise him!


\q1
3:
Sun and moon, you also must praise him!\q2 You shining stars, you praise him!
\q1
4:
You highest heavens, praise him!\q2 You waters that are high above the sky, praise him!


\q1
5:
I want all of these to praise Yahweh\q2 because by commanding that they exist, he created them.
\q1
6:
He set them in place;\q2 he commanded that they should be there forever.
\q2 They cannot disobey that command!



\q1
7:
Everything on the earth, praise Yahweh!\q2 You huge creatures and everything else that is deep in the ocean,
\q1
8:
fire and hail, snow and frost,\q2 and strong winds that obey what he commands,
\q1 I tell all of you to praise Yahweh!


\q1
9:
Hills and mountains,\q2 fruit trees and cedar trees,
\q1
10:
all the wild animals and all tame animals,\q2 reptiles and other things that creep on the ground,
\q2 and all the birds, I tell all of you to praise Yahweh!


\q1
11:
You kings on this earth and all the people that you rule,\q2 you princes and all other rulers,
\q1
12:
you young men and young women,\q2 you old people and children, everyone, praise Yahweh!



\q1
13:
I want them all to praise Yahweh\q2 because he is greater than anyone else.
\q2 His power controls everything on the earth and in the heavens.
\q1
14:
He caused us, his people, to be strong\q2 so that we Israelite people who are very precious to him
\q2 should praise him,
\q1 So praise Yahweh!
